en.description: The Zylok is a duplex-fire, cut-down variant of the Sybaris, boasting high Slash damage and status chance at the cost of critical chance and fire rate. The weapon can fire one bullet at a time by first holding down the fire button, then releasing, allowing more precision shots and ammo conservation.

ru.description: Сокрушите врагов с этим тяжеловесом в облегчённом корпусе. Обладает самовзводным механизмом, позволяющим стрелять быстро и разрушительно.

ko.description: The Zylok is a duplex-fire, cut-down variant of the Sybaris, boasting high Slash damage and status chance at the cost of critical chance and fire rate. The weapon can fire one bullet at a time by first holding down the fire button, then releasing, allowing more precision shots and ammo conservation.
